name: Rusty Axe
description:
IMPORTANT: PLAY IN FULL SCREEN MODE TO AVOID BROWSER PROBLEMS WITH ALT AND CTRL KEYS Rusty Axe  is a tribute game to Golden Axe, a famous side-scrolling beat 'em up videogame developed by Sega.

The player character is Gilius Thunderhead 

The aim of the game is to kill all 50 enemies that will be present in the level. 

Gilius Thunderhead can use also special magic attack to kill multiple enemies.
